## ðŸ“Œ What is this?

This portal provides **clean, structured, and reusable health facility data** extracted from official facility profile PDFs.

The dataset is designed to support: - Disease modelling (e.g. malaria, HIV) - Spatial accessibility analysis - Health systems research - Program planning and evaluation
